attributes.action: Provide voters with an unbiased description of the political parties they can chose to vote for
attributes.additional_details: Many voters are being deceived into voting for political parties based on propoganda without having a true perception of what the parties views are, what it stands for and what it would be like if it came into power. Therefore, I propose that everyone on the electoral is to receive unbiased information on the political parties they are able to vote for in upcoming elections. This should help reduce the number of votes for far right extremist parties such as the BNP. As well as this, it will allow all voters to unserstand the choice they have to make. If this idea were to enter into force, we would have a government elected fairply by the public who make a reasoned and accurate decision based on their opinion and not based on being bombarded by propoganda which may not always give a true reflection of the political party it is promoting.
